docstr:
`GETCWD` — Get current working directory ### Description Get current working directory. This intrinsic is provided in both subroutine and function forms; however, only one form can be used in any given program unit. ### Syntax | `STATUS = GETCWD(C)`
### Arguments and of default kind. | `STATUS` | (Optional) status flag. Returns 0 on success, a system specific and nonzero error code otherwise. ### Example ``` PROGRAM test_getcwd   CHARACTER(len=255) :: cwd   CALL getcwd(cwd)   WRITE(*,*) TRIM(cwd) END PROGRAM ``` ### Standard GNU extension ### Class Subroutine, function ### See also CHDIR
